title: Who was the first champion you purchased?
body:
Mine was Sivir, 1350 RP. I bought her because I saw a league guide on Mobafire (lol) and it had an 80% positive rating. For some reason I thought that meant 80% of people that have LoL play Sivr. When I first got into game I kept wondering how I turned into a cougar/animal like the other lady did on the opposite team. 

I was so new to MOBA's ._.
